name: Zesty Drop Dungeon
description:
A game made for YeegJam V with the theme  Light and Dark.

Controls: W, A, D  or Arrow Keys  to move E or Mouse Click  to shoot

The theme spurred me to mess around with lighting in Gdevelop for the first time and from there I attempted to make something that was atmospheric and spoopy. My aim was to achieve just that and not make any revolutionary gameplay.

Credits:

Sound Effects and Ambient: https://www.zapsplat.com/

Music by Visager: https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Visager/
